messages.title: WHAT WE'RE DOING TO TACKLE CRIME
Getting on with the country's priorities
messages.content: More police. More investment. Tougher sentences.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We've got more police officers on our streets. Helping to make our cities, towns and villages safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Breaking up county lines drug gangs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We're investing an extra £20 million to end county lines drug gangs. It means the police can strengthen their teams dedicated to breaking these gangs. And it means we can provide more support for victims.

We're stopping the most serious criminals being released halfway through their prison sentences. That means that the most violent offenders will have to spend longer in prison. And when released, they will have tougher conditions imposed. Helping to keep the public safer.

images.caption: Police officer with POLICE on the back of the vest.
Person holding a small plastic bag with a substance.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative Party, both at 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ. Printed by Paragon CC, Park House, Lower Ground Floor, 16-18 Finsbury Circus, London, EC2M 7EB.
